snippet: Jihadists have destroyed a mausoleum in central Mali that had been proposed as a United Nations World Heritage site, leaving behind a warning that they will come after all those who do not follow their strict version of Islam.
abstract: Mausoleum of Cheick Amadou Barry, proposed United Nations World Heritage site in Mali, is destroyed by jihadists who leave warning that they will attack anyone who does not follow their version of Islam.
lead_paragraph: Jihadists have destroyed a mausoleum in central Mali that had been proposed as a United Nations World Heritage site, leaving behind a warning that they will come after all those who do not follow their strict version of Islam.

headline.print_headline: Africa; Mali: Militants Destroy Prized Site
